title: Extreme Abuse
body: Riot can we please action this behavior and review this game?

replies.body: That abuse is not that bad, many other people including myself have had much worse. And as for the reporting side, it does nothing unless pretty much everyone from the lobby reports (which never happens) and there is still a large chance they won't get banned

There is a lot that happened after that screen-cap, I was hoping Riot could review the entire game. Is there any way you know how to report it to get an employee to see it? (other then the end of game report) I had people on my team trolling (anivia feeding, and placing ICE wall to deliberately trap me so I get killed, etc. It was pretty much a 1v9 my team wanted to throw because they were angry about a prior game I had 2 of them on the enemy side on my team this game, when they lost because I pushed hard. Im Plat V so I carry hard in normal's.. So they were raging and being toxic, and wanted to get back at me by griefing, going afk etc.. I was hoping because there was a lot much worse said besides this screencap.
Can we get stats on the match?
